  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    SegmentBinIO
    Minimal segment file format compatible with legacy segbin (SGB1) files.
    SegmentBinIO.Reader
    Reader for SGB1 segment files ordered lexicographically by file name.
    SegmentBinIO.Writer
    Writer for SGB1 segment files with optional rolling support.
    SegmentFileSinkAdapter
    File-based SegmentPersistencePort that writes captured segments using the SGB1 format.
    SegmentSinkAdapter
    Simple NDJSON sink for message pairs used during migration from legacy tooling.
